tool.name: OpenSwathAssayGenerator
tool.description: Generates assays according to different models for a specific TraML
tool.command:
OpenSwathAssayGenerator
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_min_transitions: -min_transitions $param_min_transitions #end if #if $param_max_transitions: -max_transitions $param_max_transitions #end if #if $param_allowed_fragment_types: -allowed_fragment_types "$param_allowed_fragment_types" #end if #if $param_allowed_fragment_charges: -allowed_fragment_charges "$param_allowed_fragment_charges" #end if #if $param_enable_detection_specific_losses: -enable_detection_specific_losses #if " " in str($param_enable_detection_specific_losses): "$param_enable_detection_specific_losses" #else $param_enable_detection_specific_losses #end if #end if #if $param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses: -enable_detection_unspecific_losses #if " " in str($param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses): "$param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses" #else $param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses #end if #end if #if $param_enable_identification_specific_losses: -enable_identification_specific_losses #if " " in str($param_enable_identification_specific_losses): "$param_enable_identification_specific_losses" #else $param_enable_identification_specific_losses #end if #end if #if $param_enable_identification_unspecific_losses: -enable_identification_unspecific_losses #if " " in str($param_enable_identification_unspecific_losses): "$param_enable_identification_unspecific_losses" #else $param_enable_identification_unspecific_losses #end if #end if #if $param_enable_identification_ms2_precursors: -enable_identification_ms2_precursors #if " " in str($param_enable_identification_ms2_precursors): "$param_enable_identification_ms2_precursors" #else $param_enable_identification_ms2_precursors #end if #end if #if $param_enable_ms1_uis_scoring: -enable_ms1_uis_scoring #if " " in str($param_enable_ms1_uis_scoring): "$param_enable_ms1_uis_scoring" #else $param_enable_ms1_uis_scoring #end if #end if #if $param_enable_ms2_uis_scoring: -enable_ms2_uis_scoring #if " " in str($param_enable_ms2_uis_scoring): "$param_enable_ms2_uis_scoring" #else $param_enable_ms2_uis_scoring #end if #end if #if $param_max_num_alternative_localizations: -max_num_alternative_localizations $param_max_num_alternative_localizations #end if #if $param_enable_reannotation: -enable_reannotation #if " " in str($param_enable_reannotation): "$param_enable_reannotation" #else $param_enable_reannotation #end if #end if #if $param_precursor_mz_threshold: -precursor_mz_threshold $param_precursor_mz_threshold #end if #if $param_precursor_lower_mz_limit: -precursor_lower_mz_limit $param_precursor_lower_mz_limit #end if #if $param_precursor_upper_mz_limit: -precursor_upper_mz_limit $param_precursor_upper_mz_limit #end if #if $param_product_mz_threshold: -product_mz_threshold $param_product_mz_threshold #end if #if $param_product_lower_mz_limit: -product_lower_mz_limit $param_product_lower_mz_limit #end if #if $param_product_upper_mz_limit: -product_upper_mz_limit $param_product_upper_mz_limit #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_swath_windows_file: -swath_windows_file $adv_opts.param_swath_windows_file #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: input file ('traML')

param.name: param_min_transitions
param.label: minimal number of transitions

param.name: param_max_transitions
param.label: maximal number of transitions

param.name: param_allowed_fragment_types
param.label: allowed fragment types

param.name: param_allowed_fragment_charges
param.label: allowed fragment charge states

param.name: param_enable_detection_specific_losses
param.label: set this flag if specific neutral losses for detection fragment ions should be allowed

param.name: param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses
param.label: set this flag if unspecific neutral losses (H2O1, H3N1, C1H2N2, C1H2N1O1) for detection fragment ions should be allowed

param.name: param_enable_identification_specific_losses
param.label: set this flag if specific neutral losses for identification fragment ions should be allowed

param.name: param_enable_identification_unspecific_losses
param.label: set this flag if unspecific neutral losses (H2O1, H3N1, C1H2N2, C1H2N1O1) for identification fragment ions should be allowed

param.name: param_enable_identification_ms2_precursors
param.label: set this flag if MS2-level precursor ions for identification should be allowed to enable extraction of the precursor signal from the fragment ion data (MS2-level)
param.help: (-enable_identification_ms2_precursors) This may help in identification if the MS1 signal is weak

param.name: param_enable_ms1_uis_scoring
param.label: set this flag if MS1-UIS assays for UIS scoring should be generated

param.name: param_enable_ms2_uis_scoring
param.label: set this flag if MS2-UIS assays for UIS scoring should be generated

param.name: param_max_num_alternative_localizations
param.label: maximum number of site-localization permutations

param.name: param_enable_reannotation
param.label: set this flag if reannotation of fragment ions should be allowed

param.name: param_precursor_mz_threshold
param.label: MZ threshold in Thomson for precursor ion selection

param.name: param_precursor_lower_mz_limit
param.label: lower MZ limit for precursor ions

param.name: param_precursor_upper_mz_limit
param.label: upper MZ limit for precursor ions

param.name: param_product_mz_threshold
param.label: MZ threshold in Thomson for fragment ion annotation

param.name: param_product_lower_mz_limit
param.label: lower MZ limit for fragment ions

param.name: param_product_upper_mz_limit
param.label: upper MZ limit for fragment ions

param.name: param_swath_windows_file
param.label: Tab separated file containing the SWATH windows for exclusion of fragment ions falling into the precursor isolation window: lower_offset upper_offset \newline 400 425 \newline ..
param.help: (-swath_windows_file) Note that the first line is a header and will be skipped

param.name: param_force
param.label: Overwrite tool specific checks

tool.help:
Generates assays according to different models for a specific TraML
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_OpenSwathAssayGenerator.html
